[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_image=”https://drivefordot.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/17C4822.jpg” min_height=”350px” custom_padding=”|||||” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”||0px” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”3_5,2_5″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ header_font=”||||||||” header_text_color=”#00578c” custom_padding=”||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Locations

No matter where you go, you’re never far from Dot. Our transportation company is headquartered in Mt. Sterling, Illinois, and has 12 distribution centers (DCs) around the country. Warehouse space totals 3 million square feet, allowing Dot to serve multiple channels in the food industry with over 100,000 products.

Across the U.S., Dot Transportation, Inc. (DTI) drivers work out of Dot Foods’ DCs as well as several terminals. To ensure our drivers receive maximum home time, we encourage you to live within a 100-mile radius of our distribution centers or terminals. Take a look below to discover your Dot home today!

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://drivefordot.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/17C9990.jpg” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”0px||0px” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Search Locations” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#f5f5f5″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.3″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

excerpt.rendered: Locations No matter where you go, you’re never far from Dot. Our transportation company is headquartered in Mt. Sterling, Illinois, and has 12 distribution centers (DCs) around the country. Warehouse space totals 3 million square feet, allowing Dot to serve multiple channels in the food industry with over 100,000 products. Across the U.S., Dot Transportation, […]

meta._et_pb_old_content:
Dot Foods is headquartered in Mt. Sterling and has 11 distribution centers around the country. Warehouse space totals 3 million square feet, allowing Dot to serve multiple channels in the food industry with over 100,000 products.

Dot Transportation drivers work out of Dot Foods’ distribution centers, plus several terminals. To assure our drivers maximum home time, we prefer to hire drivers within a 100-mile radius around our locations.

Contact Us

To contact Dot Transportation, Inc. call: 877-896-1692

yoast_head:
<!-- This site is optimized with the Yoast SEO plugin v19.7.1 - https://yoast.com/wordpress/plugins/seo/ -->
<title>Trucking Company Locations | Drive For Dot | Dot Transportation, Inc.</title>
